--- Astroblast / Dead-End / Drag Strip ---

Astroblast, Dead-End, and Drag Strip automaticly follow Megatron, 
chanting right after he finishes, "Hail Cybertron, Hail Megatron, and 
destruction to the Autobots!"


On 24 Jun 2001, at 10:30, robertdahl wrote:

> Stood up straight, displaying the sheer power he held, as he held his
> cannon up. "Yes, I remember you Dominjoe." He turned around, and
> walked back a bit, contemplating, both hands behind his back as he
> paced. He then aproached again. His voice this time lost all emotion,
> and became very serious. "As Cybertronians, you are superior to other
> creatures of the Universe. Therefor it is our right, to rule them."
> Megatron said, looking at Blindchaos. "The Autobots have failed to
> realize this, therefor are classed in that inferior category. Never
> forget the glory of what Cybertron should be." and as he finished that
> sentence he stepped back, and held his hand up, "Hail Cybertron." he
> chanted. "And Destruction to the Autobots."
> 
>
